section.title: RP 8 part 1
paragraph: The review problem set for today contains three review problems.

paragraph.#text:
This first problem is based on the  function that was previously
described.

list_item.paragraph: Helper functions using the accumulator pattern

paragraph.#text:
This problem will have you use the  function to implement an
efficient sorting algorithm.

section.title: RP 8 part 3
section.paragraph:
This problem will give you a lot more practice with the accumulator pattern.
It is a randomized problem. You have to solve it three times in a row.
